title: Birmingham (England)
name: Wagamama
content: Bullring plaza, (''under Borders''), B5 4QL, ''+44 121'' 633 6033. M-Sa Noon-11PM, Su12:30PM-10PM. Birmingham's restaurant of the Wagamama chain, tidy and minimal inside with a good, varied noodle menu. Specials change frequently and there are a few good vegetarian dishes. Can get busy, with a typical wait from 10-15 minutes during peak shopping times.
